article_text: (RNS) For now, forget about your career and what you will become. Don’t worry that your grade in bio-statistics or geology won’t land you that great job. It’s probably not that great anyway. Now is the time to focus on who you are going to become. By Will Berkovitz.

article_metadata.description: Rabbi Will Berkovitz is Chief Executive Officer of Jewish Family Service, which delivers essential human services to vulnerable people in the Puget Sound region.

og.description: Rabbi Will Berkovitz is Chief Executive Officer of Jewish Family Service, which delivers essential human services to vulnerable people in the Puget Sound region.
og.title: Religion News Service » Will Berkovitz

article_summary:
Don’t worry that your grade in bio-statistics or geology won’t land you that great job.
(RNS) For now, forget about your career and what you will become.
It’s probably not that great anyway.
Now is the time to focus on who you are going to become.
By Will Berkovitz.
